body.name: TMA Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, 6 in 1 Stick Vacuum Cleaner with 4 Filters 8-Cell Battery & 40 Mins Running Time 1.3L Dust Cup&LED Floor Brush Head for Hardwood Floor Deep Clean T150
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: 【Detachable Large Capacity Battery】T150 vacuum cleaner equipped with upgraded Detachable 8-Cell Lithium-ion 2200mAh large capacity battery, The upgraded new 8-cell battery has a longer battery life than the traditional 6-cell battery, clean whole house with one charge instead.

【 Excellent Suction】Powerful high-efficiency motor generating maximum 15Kpa excellent suction, Suitable for cleaning up large particles bread crumbs, animal hair, etc. Standard mode offers up to 40 minutes longer runtime, more suitable for daily cleaning.

【LED Motorized Floor Brush&180° Flexible movable】The Motorized Floor Brush is fitted with LED lights at the top, which helps track dirt in dark and hard-to-reach places. swivels 180° sideways and 90° up and down Flexible and movable, Let there be no hiding place for all dirt.

【High-Efficiency Filtration System】Vacuum with an excellent cyclone system and high-density meshing filter, It can effectively capture 99.7% of the tiny dust particles as small as 0.3 microns, and locks in small particles without leakage. ​Also, with abundant accessories, it is very convenient to clean the sofa/car/desk/crevices/curtains and comes with a wall hanger easy to store.

【1.3L Capacity & Ergonomic Design】 T150 stick vacuum cleaner handle uses an extremely ergonomic wide handle design, making it long and clean not tiring, and easy to clean the whole house, extra large 1.3 L dustbin means you can meet multiple cleanings, one press button for the easy empty dust cup.

Does this vacuum cleaner come with an extra filter? Yes, the vacuum main motor comes with a filter and there are another 3 extra filters in the box. What to do if the suction power of the vacuum cleaner decreases after a period of use? We suggest that you maintain the vacuum regularly and keep the vacuum inside clear and unclogged, replace the filter every 2-3 months depending on your usage. The package contains 4 filters. This will ensure filtration and cleaning for a year. How long is the warr-anty on this vacuum cleaner? We offer a 30-day Worr-y-free exchange and a 12-month parts replacement warr-anty. Whenever you need help, please feel free to conta-ct us and we will do our best to solve all problems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars light weight and suction.
reviews.reviewText: I love this vacuum, it is so easy to use and light weight. I have had a bad back for 30 years and have hard time with vacuuming but this machine is super easy to use and works great . Thank s from Green Creek N.C.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not good for pet hair on carpets
reviews.reviewText: This works really well for hardwood and tile floors. It does not work well to pick up dog hair off of carpets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great cordless lightweight vacuum
reviews.reviewText: Great for vacuuming and very lightweight!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars WASTE OF MONEY - COMPANY IS NOT HELPFUL
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this a month ago, about 2 weeks after I got it the battery died and would not recharge. I emailed back and forth with the retailer and they tried "helping" but nothing they told me to do would help, they also would take 3-4 days to get back to me. When I finally asked for a replacement part they, of course, were out of stock and would let me know when they get a new one in. That was 8 days ago...Tried filing a claim with asurion (the insurance you can purchase with the vacuum) and they told me I had to reach out to the retailer.Not to mention it would literally get clogged sucking up cat hair... NOT WORTH THE PURCHASE

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Pretty nice,easy to install and didn't really need the instructions to put together. Comes with 3 filters which was awesome. Nice white and used on my rug, tile. Hardwood floors. For the price I saved a lot and way more easier to clean than constantly bending over with a dust pan. Has a nice led light in dark spots. Great buy. Would definitely recommend.My only reason for not giving a five star because the head is very flimsy lol and it doesn't stand on its own.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this vacuum for my cat room. I have multiple cats and was hoping this vacuum would be great to use daily to pick up litter and cat hair off my hard surface floor. Unfortunately, it did not take much to clog up the tube so this vacuum is not going to work for me. I believe the problem is the tubing is too narrow to handle much. I am returning it. That said, it is a nice little vacuum if you want to use it for light dusting and clean up around the house. I wish it would have worked better for what I needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The quality of the vacuum is outstanding, very light, and very user-friendly, one that I would purchase again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for the money!
reviews.reviewText: If this great little vacuum keeps working like it has the first couple of times I've used it, I highly recommend it! I am very pleased with everything about it!👍🏼
